title: Middle.Earth.Shadow.of.Mordor.Repack-R.G.Mechanics

Sound Card : Sound device compatible with DirectXÃ‚Â® 9.0

Game information:  


The players have to try on the role of Ranger Talion, whose family killed minions
of Sauron. He is alive only because of the Spirit of Vengeance, which not only gave
him back his life, but also gave supernatural powers.

Talion sent into the depths of Mordor to get revenge. As events unfold, it will be
opened by the truth that the Spirit brought him back to the living world. He learns
about the rings of power and enter into battle with his archenemy.

Each opponent who will meet you on the road, will have unique features: the strong
and weak sides. Your actions and decisions will determine the characteristics and
relationships of enemies. This is accomplished using mechanical Nemesis System.
The world of Middle-earth: Shadows of Mordor is dynamic and responds to your actions,
adapting to your gaming solutions. Each player in Middle-earth: Shadow of Mordor will
have his own adventure.

Game Features:  

Use phantom power and revenge the enemy in close combat, or lurking in the shadows,
destroying enemies from afar.

See ghostly vision and define ahilessovu heel every opponent: weakness, habits and
characteristics that can be used for the benefit of themselves.

Treat the enemies get them to commit this or that act, to bleed together. Mordor
subdue his will.

Learn how to appear rings of power and become the most feared warrior in Mordor.
History Talion occurs between the events unfolding in the trilogy, "The Hobbit"
and "Lord of the Rings."

Get rewarded, better weapons, enhance skills and abilities.


RePack Features:  


Middle Earth: Shadow of Mordor
Do not cut / recoded
An opportunity not to download HD texture (data_hd.bin)
